title: I think this is the mother of all 419ers
body: <p>I am always pleasantly surprised at the diversity of the <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/419/" title="419er email collection">419 emails</a> I get.  I think <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/419/pls%20i%20need%20your%20assitance.eml" title="pls i need your assitance">this 117KB monstrosity takes the cake</a>.  I like how there's an attachment with a list of all the emails it was sent to, but even better is that the message is repeated 32 times in the email. Thank you <a href="mailto:ericlucky@myway.com" title="20 Million US dollars in 100 dollar bills">MR. ERIC LUCKY</a>!</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-12-09
